Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at AMC Apartments - Kurfürstendamm places you in the heart of Berlin, walking distance from Kaethe Kollwitz Museum and Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church. This apartment is close to Reichstag Building and Brandenburg Gate.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 43 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. 26-36-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as minibars and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the apartment's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the apartment's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 43 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. 26-36-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as minibars and coffee/tea makers.

A stay at AMC Apartments - Kurfürstendamm places you in the heart of Berlin, walking distance from Kaethe Kollwitz Museum and Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church. This apartment is close to Reichstag Building and Brandenburg Gate.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kaethe Kollwitz Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Theatre of the West - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
The Story of Berlin - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Europa Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
KaDeWe - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Berlin Zoo - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Technical University - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Bauhaus Archive - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Schaubuehne - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Victory Column - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Deutsche Oper Berlin - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Grips-Theater - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Schoneberg City Hall - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Bellevue Palace - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 17.5 km / 10.9 mi

The preferred airport for AMC Apartments - Kurfürstendamm is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Message.Text:
AMC APARTMENTS CONSIST OF TWO SEPARATE BUILDINGS, LOCATED 600 MTS AWAY FROM EACH OTHER. TRANSFER AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. / LOS APARTAMENTOS AMC SE COMPONEN DE 2 EDIFICIOS SEPARADOS, SITUADOS A 600 MTS DE DISTANCIA. EXISTEN TRANSFERS DISPONIBLES BAJO PETICION.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
